name: TechBiz
all_locations: New Delhi, DL, India; MH, India; Remote
long_description: SMEs find it hard to derive value from their business data which is stuck inside hard-to-access accounting softwares. We provide them an app-first MIS/Business Intelligence solution to track their business essentials (Debtors, Creditors, Sales, Outstanding etc.) and help make quicker and better decisions.
one_liner: MIS on mobile for SMB's in India
